1: <pb/><t>A mactxel pitc'al chi yut ba caxc'al xiwilxa el chi ak'lay cuenta, a jun tu', lemẍic'al ok lajwok ayok, cax c'amxa tzet watx' ok yunej.</t>
2: <t>A yet chi oc eb watx' is nabal yin ikbej, caw wal chi tzaloj eb anima; palta a yet chi yajawbi eb yobtakwom, caw wal chi cus c'ul eb anima.</t>
3: <t>A junok uninalej watx', caw wal chi yak' tzalojbok c'ul is mam. A mactxel chi ec' yintak eb ajmul ix, caw wal chi yak' lajwok ay is tumin.</t>
4: <t>A junok rey tol watx' yin is beyc'ulal, caw wal watx' yayji is conob; a pax junok rey tol asanc'al tumin chi k'anilok, a jun tu' chi yak' lajwok ay is conob.</t>
5: <t>A mactxel toc'al chi tz'ak yal watx' k'anej yin yamigo, wal yel a jun tu', lanan yaon ay yal satak.</t>
6: <t>A junok yobtakwom, a is mul axca wal yal yayji oc bay; a pax junok mac caw wal watx' is nabal xin, yinc'al junc'ulal c'al tzalojc'ulal ayic'ok.</t>
7: <t>A mactxel tojol, watx' chi yut watx'nen el is k'anej eb meba'; a pax junok yobtakwom xin, tok ay yelapnok eb meba' yul sat.</t>
8: <t>A eb buchwajwom chi yuchaj bulnaj eb junok conob; a pax eb aj nabal xin, yojtak eb chi yak' sicbok ayok.</t>
9: <t>Ta a junok aj nabal chi teyelej ba satak juez yetok junok c'am is nabal, a jun c'am is nabal tu', chi tit yowal, ma toc'al chi buchwaji, cax c'am tzet yetal chi watx'ji.</t>
10: <t>A eb mak'om cam anima, chi yajlay eb watx' nabal yuj eb, cax chi yochej eb chi mak' camok.</t>
11: <t>A eb yob is nabal, bekanxac'al yion el eb yowal c'ul; a pax mac ay is nabal xin, chi mitx' waay ba yetok yowal c'ul.</t>
12: <t>Ta a junok yajaw chi cha yab lek'tial, masanil eb ayoc yin opiso yetok, lek'tic'al el eb.</t>
13: <t>A mac chi etnelayi, c'al mac chi etnewi, lajan yayji eb yin jun ti'; a yuj Jehová xan chi je' yilwan eb cawanil.</t>
14: <t>A junok rey watx' chi yut is beyc'ulal yiban eb meba', caw wal watx'c'al yayji bay is trono yin tojbalk'inal.</t>
15: <t>A mactxel chi yab yail, cax chi ak'lay cuenta, chi cuychaj yuj; a pax eb uninalej c'am chi ak'lay cuenta xin, chi yak' q'uixwan eb is txutx.</t>
16: <t>A yet chi aj can eb yobtakwom, caw wal chi aj can mulej; axa eb anima watx' is nabal, ok yil wal eb yayc'ay eb yobtakwom tu'.</t>
17: <t>Ak' cuenta oninal, yet watx' ay a junc'ulal, yuj tu' ok ach ayjok ec' yin tzalojc'ulal.</t>
18: <t>A bay c'am chi ablay k'anjab eb chekbej Dios, chic'al yun eb anima masanil pojanil yobtakilal, palta caw wal watx' yet mac tol chi yikej ley Dios.</t>
19: <t>A yinc'al k'anejal, c'am chi je' yak'lay cuenta junok mosejal, caxc'al chi nachaj el yuj, palta c'am chi yikej.</t>
20: <t>Watx'to wal ok eloc junok c'am is nabal, yintak pax mac comonc'al chi k'anjabi.</t>
21: <t>A mactxel c'am chi tenchanej is moso yin yaliẍal, axa yin lajubal, caw wal ok yab yail yuj.</t>
22: <t>A mactxel ow chi yut yion aj can owal; a mactxel c'un tit yowal, ayc'al tzet yetal man watx'ok chi yunej.</t>
23: <t>A mactxel chi mimanej ba, chi ilay ayok; axa mactxel yaynakil chi yut ba, chi ilay aj can.</t>
24: <t>A mactxel chi junanej ba yetok eb elk'om, ac'al oc chi yitek yiban, yujtol max yak' ti' yalon el yin jichanil satak juez, palta maj yal paxok.</t>
25: <t>A mac chi xiw bay yet animail, ac'al oc chi yak' ayc'ay ba; a pax mac chi yaoc c'ul yin Jehová xin, caw wal taynebil.</t>
26: <t>Xiwil mactxel chi sayon is watx'c'ulalil eb yajaw; palta asan Jehová chi watx'nen el k'anej yin watx'il.</t>
27: <t>A eb anima watx' is nabal, c'am chi ochelay eb yobtakwom yuj eb; axa pax eb yobtakwom, c'am c'apax chi ochelay eb watx' is nabal yuj eb.</t>
